QuestData.Title: Taerar's Fall
QuestData.Description: Emeriss and Lethon are gone. It's only us left now. I can hide from this no longer. All I did while a part of that brood...all the suffering I've caused...must be repaid today.$B$BI am still weak, $n. I cannot assume my true form even if I dare try. But I will still stand beside you in battle.$B$BIf you are prepared, I will call Taerar to us. He will be unable to resist the temptation of revisiting corruption upon me.
QuestData.RewardText: It is done.$B$BThis land that has suffered so much can rest now.
